JaVale McGee: A vertical rim protector and lob finisher with elite shot-blocking timing. Provides energy, rebounding, and interior defense presence.
Rodney McGruder: A steady veteran guard who defends well on the perimeter, moves intelligently off the ball, and spaces the floor as a reliable spot-up shooter.
Jordan McLaughlin: A cerebral point guard with sharp playmaking instincts, ball control, and defensive effort. Excellent at initiating offense and facilitating tempo.
De'Anthony Melton: A two-way guard with elite defensive hands, transition play, and improved perimeter shooting. Brings energy, switchability, and off-ball pressure.
Sam Merrill: A pure shooter with elite mechanics, movement efficiency, and floor-spacing ability. Contributes with smart positioning and off-ball activity.
Chimezie Metu: A mobile forward/center with athletic finishing, rim protection, and rebounding ability. Adds versatility with midrange touch and switch defense.
Khris Middleton: A polished wing scorer with smooth shooting, midrange mastery, and playmaking ability. Defensively disciplined and effective in structured systems.
Patty Mills: A veteran guard with elite perimeter shooting, quick release, and high basketball IQ. Provides energy, off-ball movement, and veteran leadership.
Shake Milton: A tall combo guard with scoring versatility, fluid jumper, and solid secondary playmaking. Comfortable creating from pick-and-roll or isolation.
Donovan Mitchell: An elite scoring guard with explosive first step, advanced shot creation, and defensive strength. Dominant in isolation and clutch scoring scenarios.
Malik Monk: A high-energy guard with elite shooting confidence, athleticism, and creation ability. Excels in transition, off-ball scoring, and secondary playmaking.
Ja Morant: An explosive playmaking guard with elite speed, body control, and finishing at the rim. Generates offense through transition and creative pick-and-roll execution.
Marcus Morris: A physical forward with consistent midrange shooting, post scoring, and defensive toughness. Effective as a stretch-four with rebounding strength.
Markieff Morris: A veteran big forward with interior strength, defensive versatility, and reliable catch-and-shoot spacing. Brings physicality and experience to frontcourt rotations.
Monte Morris: A composed point guard with exceptional turnover control, efficient shooting, and steady leadership. Executes offense with precision and poise.
Dejounte Murray: A long, athletic guard with elite rebounding, midrange control, and defensive impact. Creates off the dribble and guards multiple positions effectively.
Jamal Murray: A dynamic scoring guard with elite shooting off movement, advanced footwork, and composure under pressure. Excellent pick-and-roll execution and off-ball play.
Mike Muscala: A floor-spacing big with smooth perimeter shooting, smart rotations, and strong understanding of team defense. Adds veteran reliability and spacing versatility.
Svi Mykhailiuk: A skilled wing with shooting range, secondary playmaking, and fluid movement off the ball. Effective in motion offense and spot-up situations.
An athletic forward/center with elite defensive switchability, vertical finishing, and high IQ passing. Adds energy, rebounding, and rim protection.
Aaron Nesmith: A physical 3-and-D wing with defensive tenacity, shooting range, and strong motor. Excels at closing out, contesting shots, and cutting off-ball.
Raul Neto: A veteran point guard with strong defensive fundamentals, playmaking control, and composure under pressure. Executes efficiently within structured systems.
Georges Niang: A stretch forward with elite catch-and-shoot efficiency, high IQ movement, and smart spacing. Plays strong team defense and contributes to ball circulation.
Zeke Nnaji: A mobile big with rebounding ability, midrange touch, and defensive switch potential. Provides hustle, rim finishing, and positional versatility.
Nerlens Noel: A long, athletic rim protector with elite shot-blocking instincts, vertical spacing, and rebounding presence. Excels in defensive coverage and transition plays.
Jaylen Nowell: A scoring guard with downhill aggression, strong finishing, and midrange touch. Creates offense off penetration and brings energy off the bench.
Frank Ntilikina: A tall, disciplined defender with length, anticipation, and versatility to guard multiple positions. Facilitates offense with composure and spacing awareness.
Kendrick Nunn: A confident scoring guard with smooth jumper, quick first step, and shot creation ability. Provides instant offense and rhythm shooting in rotations.
Jusuf Nurkic: A powerful center with strong post presence, rebounding, and playmaking from the high post. Excellent screener and interior finisher.
Jordan Nwora: A smooth wing shooter with range, size, and scoring versatility. Adds spacing, shot creation, and rebounding from the perimeter.
Royce O'Neale: A defensive specialist with strong positional awareness, rebounding, and consistent perimeter shooting. Provides toughness and versatility in switch-heavy schemes.
Chuma Okeke: A versatile forward with excellent defensive timing, rebounding, and emerging three-point touch. Contributes in transition and as a spot-up shooter.
Josh Okogie: A high-energy defender with elite lateral quickness, strength, and hustle. Effective on-ball stopper who pressures passing lanes and attacks the rim.
Onyeka Okongwu: A mobile big with elite defensive instincts, rim protection, and switch agility. Finishes efficiently as a roller and rebounder.
Isaac Okoro: A strong wing defender with elite on-ball pressure, physical strength, and cutting ability. Contributes with hustle, drives, and team defense.
KZ Okpala: A long, athletic forward with defensive versatility, rebounding effort, and transition finishing. Effective in switch coverage and off-ball movement.
Victor Oladipo: A two-way guard with defensive instincts, explosive first step, and secondary playmaking ability. Strong in transition and perimeter containment.
Kelly Olynyk: A skilled big with elite floor spacing, passing feel, and pick-and-pop scoring. Provides offensive versatility and intelligent team defense.
Cedi Osman: A versatile forward with energy, cutting instincts, and transition finishing. Adds spacing and secondary playmaking value.
An athletic wing with strong slashing, transition scoring, and defensive intensity. Active on cuts and effective guarding multiple positions.
Chris Paul: An elite guard with exceptional IQ, excellent pick-and-roll and superb vision. Midrange mastery. Directs offense with precision and applies defensive pressure effectively.
Cameron Payne: A fast-paced guard with quick handle, strong pull-up shooting, and energy off the bench. Pushes tempo and contributes to spacing.
Gary Payton II: An elite on-ball defender with quick hands, anticipation, and athletic finishing. Contributes through hustle, cutting, and secondary playmaking.
Theo Pinson: A team-oriented wing with leadership presence, communication skills, and defensive versatility. Adds value through energy and adaptability.
Mason Plumlee: A mobile, high-IQ big with elite passing for his size, rebounding strength, and screen-setting ability. Finishes efficiently and defends the paint.
Jakob Poeltl: A traditional center with elite rim protection, screening, and interior finishing. Excellent defensive communicator and rebounder.
Aleksej Pokusevski: A tall, skilled forward with shooting range, passing creativity, and coordination. Brings unique versatility with ball-handling and floor spacing.
Jordan Poole: A dynamic scoring guard with deep range, advanced shot creation, and quick first step. Effective in transition and off-ball scoring actions.
Jontay Porter: A skilled forward/center with touch, vision, and floor-spacing potential. Provides intelligent passing and rebounding fundamentals.
A creative scoring guard with elite handle, shot creation, and finishing ability. Generates offense off isolation and pick-and-roll play.
A tall, smooth forward with elite shooting touch, off-ball movement, and rebounding ability. Provides efficient scoring and spacing for high-level offenses.
A veteran forward with elite positional awareness, perimeter shooting, and defensive discipline. Excels in spacing and off-ball efficiency.
Bobby Portis: A high-energy forward with strong rebounding, midrange shooting, and physical interior play. Brings toughness and scoring from the frontcourt.
Kristaps Porzingis: A skilled 7-footer with elite shooting range, rim protection, and interior scoring. Provides spacing, shot-blocking, and mismatch creation.
Dwight Powell: A high-effort big with elite rim-running, screening, and vertical spacing. Adds defensive activity and finishing consistency in pick-and-roll actions.
Norman Powell: A strong scoring guard with efficient three-point shooting, attacking ability, and transition finishing. Defends physically and spaces the floor.
Taurean Prince: A two-way forward with perimeter defense, spot-up shooting, and rebounding toughness. Plays efficiently within team structure.
Payton Pritchard: A confident point guard with deep shooting range, off-ball movement, and playmaking control. Provides spacing and tempo management.
Immanuel Quickley: Energetic guard with excellent floater and pull-up scoring. Can create shots off the dribble and attack closeouts efficiently.
Jahmi'us Ramsey: Athletic guard with slashing ability and finishing at the rim. Can defend multiple positions and contribute on transition.
Julius Randle: Power forward with strong scoring versatility, handles the ball well for his size, and can finish inside and from midrange. Effective as a screener and in pick-and-roll actions.
Cam Reddish: Forward with smooth shooting touch, spacing ability, and defensive versatility. Can attack the rim in transition and rotate defensively across wings.
Davon Reed: Wing shooter with catch-and-shoot range and perimeter defensive ability. Can move off the ball and cut to the basket efficiently.
Paul Reed: Forward with elite energy, rebounding, rim protection, and athletic finishing around the basket. Effective in transition and pick-and-roll coverage.
Naz Reid: Forward/center with soft touch, scoring versatility inside and midrange, and mobility to protect the rim and help in team defense.
Nick Richards: Athletic big with rim protection, finishing ability around the basket, and effective rebounding positioning. Can roll in pick-and-rolls and protect paint defensively.
Josh Richardson: Wing with versatile on-ball and help defense, solid catch-and-shoot ability, and off-ball movement for spacing. Can cut efficiently and defend multiple positions.
Austin Rivers: Combo guard capable of scoring off the catch or drive, plays solid perimeter defense, and can navigate screens efficiently.
Duncan Robinson: Elite catch-and-shoot guard with deep range and spacing impact. Moves well off the ball and sets effective screens for teammates.
Jerome Robinson: Guard with shooting range and floor spacing ability. Can move without the ball and finish at the rim in transition.
Mitchell Robinson: Athletic center with elite rim protection, shot-blocking, and lob-finishing. Efficient in pick-and-roll rolls and defensive rotations.
Isaiah Roby: Forward with spacing ability, perimeter shooting, and versatility to switch defensively. Can finish at the rim and contribute on rebounds.
Derrick Rose: Guard with elite craft in midrange scoring, pull-up ability, and attacking the basket. Effective in pick-and-rolls and transition scoring.
Terrence Ross: Athletic wing with catch-and-shoot proficiency, ability to score off the dribble, and defensive versatility in perimeter rotations.
Terry Rozier: Scoring guard with pull-up shooting, off-ball movement, and ability to create in isolation or pick-and-roll. Effective in transition and late-game situations.
Ricky Rubio: Point guard with elite vision, passing, and tempo control. Can facilitate offense efficiently and provide perimeter defense and help rotations.
D'Angelo Russell: Guard with smooth shooting, creation off the dribble, and playmaking flair. Can space the floor and facilitate for teammates effectively.
Domantas Sabonis: Big with elite passing, scoring versatility, rebounding, and pick-and-roll finishing. Can defend in team concepts and provide interior help.
Luka Samanic: Forward with shooting touch, mobility, and spacing ability. Can roll in pick-and-rolls and switch on perimeter defense.
Dario Saric: Forward with passing skills, floor spacing, and catch-and-shoot range. Can rebound effectively and defend multiple positions in team schemes.
Admiral Schofield: Physical wing with defensive versatility, effort in rotations, and off-ball cutting. Can spot up for perimeter shots and crash the boards.
Dennis Schroder: Point guard with quick drives, pick-and-roll execution, and perimeter defense. Can score in transition and create off the bounce.
Collin Sexton: Explosive guard with strong midrange scoring, attacking the rim, and finishing through contact. Can move off-ball and create pick-and-roll opportunities.
Landry Shamet: Shooting guard with deep range, off-ball movement, and spacing ability. Effective in catch-and-shoot situations and cutting off screens.
Pascal Siakam: Forward/center with mobility, midrange shooting, pick-and-roll finishing, and passing for his size. Can switch defensively and protect the rim in help schemes.
Chris Silva: Forward with rebounding, athletic finishing, and defensive energy. Can roll in pick-and-rolls and provide help defense in the paint.
Ben Simmons: Guard/forward with elite playmaking, transition scoring, defensive versatility, and ability to guard multiple positions. Can initiate offense and finish at the rim efficiently.
Kobi Simmons: Athletic guard with slashing ability, finishing at the rim, and perimeter defense. Can space floor with occasional off-ball shooting.
Anfernee Simons: Scoring guard with deep range, pull-up shooting, and smooth handle. Can create off the dribble and finish in transition or isolation.
Marcus Smart: Guard with elite perimeter defense, playmaking, and clutch scoring. Can facilitate for teammates, defend multiple positions, and control pace.
Athletic guard with driving ability, finishing at the rim, and perimeter defense. Can score in transition and attack closeouts.
Ish Smith: Point guard with speed, penetration, and passing vision. Can facilitate offense and exploit gaps in transition effectively.
Jalen Smith: Forward with rebounding, size, and midrange scoring. Can defend multiple positions and rotate effectively in team defense.
Lamar Stevens: Forward with finishing through contact, rebounding, and defensive versatility. Can set screens and roll effectively in pick-and-rolls.
Isaiah Stewart: Forward/center with rebounding, interior scoring, physicality, and rim protection. Can set screens and rotate defensively in help schemes.
Max Strus: Sharpshooting guard with range, off-ball movement, and spacing impact. Can cut efficiently and hit catch-and-shoot opportunities.
Edmond Sumner: Guard with transition scoring, attacking the rim, and off-ball movement. Can facilitate in secondary playmaking and cut off ball screens.
Jae'Sean Tate: Forward with defensive versatility, energy, and smart team basketball. Can finish at rim, defend multiple positions, and move off-ball efficiently.
Jayson Tatum: Forward with elite scoring from all levels, spacing impact, footwork, and two-way ability. Can create for self and others, defend multiple positions, and shoot off the dribble or catch.
Garrett Temple: Veteran guard with defensive awareness, team IQ, and perimeter spacing. Can cut effectively and provide energy off the ball.
Daniel Theis: Center with pick-and-roll setting, rim protection, and defensive rotations. Can finish rolls efficiently and defend multiple frontcourt alignments.
Isaiah Thomas: Guard with scoring instincts, pull-up shooting, and finishing ability. Can create separation and attack off the bounce efficiently.
Klay Thompson: Guard with elite catch-and-shoot ability, spacing gravity, off-ball movement, and efficient midrange scoring. Can defend wings effectively.
Tristan Thompson: Forward/center with rebounding, physical interior defense, and pick-and-roll finishing. Can set screens and box out effectively.
Matisse Thybulle: Wing with elite perimeter defense, on-ball pressure, and help rotations. Can cut and finish in transition and provide spacing gravity.
Forward with defensive IQ, rim protection, and effort. Can pass from high and low post, and finish around the rim efficiently.
Obi Toppin: Forward with athletic finishing, transition scoring, and off-ball movement. Can roll effectively in pick-and-rolls and contribute spacing.
Juan Toscano-Anderson: Forward with defensive versatility, energy, and hustle. Can guard multiple positions and cut/spread the floor off-ball.
Karl-Anthony Towns: Center with elite scoring range, post moves, and pick-and-roll versatility. Can space floor, rebound, and protect the rim in team schemes.
Guard with scoring ability, catch-and-shoot range, off-ball movement, and perimeter defense. Can attack closeouts and finish at rim.
P.J. Tucker: Forward with corner shooting, physical defense, and switchability. Can set screens, cut, and defend multiple positions effectively.
Myles Turner: Center with elite shot-blocking, floor spacing, pick-and-roll finishing, and defensive rotations. Can protect paint and rebound effectively.
Jonas Valanciunas: Center with rebounding dominance, post scoring, interior finishing, and pick-and-roll roll execution. Can protect paint and set effective screens.
Fred VanVleet: Guard with strong shooting, perimeter scoring, pick-and-roll execution, and on-ball defense. Can create for teammates and generate spacing with gravity.
Jarred Vanderbilt: Forward with elite rebounding, rim protection, help defense, and transition finishing. Provides energy on both ends and effective roll/pop actions.
Devin Vassell: Wing with smooth shooting, defensive IQ, and off-ball movement. Can switch on defense, space the floor, and cut efficiently in transition.
Gabe Vincent: Guard with confident perimeter shooting, off-ball movement, and team defense. Can space the floor, hit spot-up threes, and cut in transition.
Noah Vonleh: Forward with rebounding strength, interior finishing, and physical defense. Can roll in pick-and-rolls and protect the rim in help schemes.
Nikola Vucevic: Center with scoring versatility, touch in the post, pick-and-pop shooting, and passing from high and low post. Can rebound efficiently and screen effectively.
Dean Wade: Forward with spacing ability, catch-and-shoot shooting, and team defense. Can cut efficiently, set screens, and contribute on rotations.
Moritz Wagner: Forward/center with perimeter shooting, spacing ability, and transition finishing. Can defend multiple positions and roll in pick-and-roll schemes.
Kemba Walker: Point guard with elite ball-handling, midrange scoring, pull-up shooting, and pick-and-roll creation. Can control pace and finish in transition efficiently.
Lonnie Walker IV: Athletic guard with shooting range, scoring burst off the dribble, and off-ball movement. Can cut, space the floor, and defend multiple positions.
John Wall: Point guard with elite speed, pick-and-roll execution, finishing at the rim, and playmaking vision. Can push transition and create for teammates effectively.
T.J. Warren: Forward with midrange scoring, pick-and-roll finishing, and transition attacking ability. Can create separation and score efficiently off the catch.
P.J. Washington: Forward with spacing, perimeter shooting, pick-and-roll finishing, and defensive versatility. Can defend multiple positions and roll effectively in team schemes.
Yuta Watanabe: Forward with defensive versatility, help rotations, and catch-and-shoot ability. Can space the floor, move off-ball, and contribute in transition.
Russell Westbrook: Guard with explosive attacking ability, rim finishing, rebounding, and pick-and-roll creation. Can push and control pace. He also can create for teammates off the bounce.
Coby White: Guard with speed, pull-up shooting, and off-ball movement. Can attack closeouts, finish in transition, and generate spacing with gravity.
Derrick White: Guard with defensive versatility, pick-and-roll defense, midrange scoring, and off-ball movement. Can facilitate efficiently and contribute on rotations.
Andrew Wiggins: Wing with scoring efficiency, off-ball movement, transition finishing, and perimeter defense. Can switch across positions and cut effectively.
Grant Williams: Forward with defense, pick-and-roll spacing, corner shooting, and physicality. Can move off-ball, set screens, and contribute on rotations.
Kenrich Williams: Wing with defensive versatility, rebounding, off-ball movement, and pick-and-roll spacing. Can cut and rotate effectively in team concepts.
Patrick Williams: Forward with defensive versatility, length, athleticism, and rebounding. Can cut, finish at the rim, and provide spacing gravity.
Robert Williams: Center with elite rim protection, vertical finishing, pick-and-roll rolls, and defensive rotations. Can protect paint and rebound at high level.
Zion Williamson: Forward with explosive finishing, transition scoring, rim protection, and pick-and-roll rolls. Can create for teammates and space the floor with gravity.
D.J. Wilson: Forward with floor spacing, pick-and-roll rolls, and perimeter shooting. Can contribute on defensive rotations and cut in transition.
Dylan Windler: Wing with catch-and-shoot ability, off-ball movement, and rebounding. Can cut efficiently and stretch the floor with shooting gravity.
Justise Winslow: Forward with defensive versatility, switchability, playmaking from the wing, and transition finishing. Can defend multiple positions and roll in pick-and-rolls.
James Wiseman: Center with rim-running, shot-blocking, finishing around the basket, and pick-and-roll execution. Can protect paint and rebound effectively.
Christian Wood: Forward/center with scoring versatility, midrange and inside touch, rebounding, and floor spacing. Can finish in transition and roll in pick-and-rolls.
Delon Wright: Guard with defensive versatility, pick-and-roll defense, passing vision, and size. Can facilitate offense, move off-ball, and cut efficiently.
Thaddeus Young: Forward with IQ, screening, rebounding, and secondary playmaking. Can defend multiple positions and contribute efficiently in rotations.
Trae Young: Guard with deep shooting range, pick-and-roll creation, off-ball movement, and elite vision. Can score from multiple levels and generate spacing for teammates.
Cody Zeller: Center with screening, rebounding, pick-and-roll finishing, and interior touch. Can protect paint and roll effectively in team schemes.
Ivica Zubac: Center with rebounding, interior scoring, pick-and-roll finishing, and defensive positioning. Can protect paint and defend multiple frontcourt alignments.
